0010111000111100 1011101011110111 1 -> sum: 1110100100110100, cout: 0

0001011001100001 0110111101000101 0 -> sum: 1000010110100110, cout: 0
1010000010000111 1111011010011111 0 -> sum: 1001011100100110, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
